content.body:
### Shop 225/60R15 Tire Size
What kinds of vehicles use the 225/60R15 tire size? It’s a size you’ll find almost exclusively on older models of the BMW 528i, Cadillac Allanteand, Chevrolet Corvette, Ford Mustang, Mercury Cougar, and an assortment of classic cars. 

Popular vehicles
1997-2000 BMW 528i
1987-1988 Cadillac Allante
1982 Chevrolet Corvette Collector’s Edition
1985-1990 Ford Mustang GT
1985-1988 Mercury Cougar

225/60R15 tires are commonly found on older vehicles, but that doesn’t mean they can’t have great tires. The [General Altimax RT43](https://simpletire.com/brands/general-tires/altimax-rt43), Mastercraft Avenger G/T, <!-- Uniroyal Tiger Paw Touring A/S, --> Nexen CP641, and Ohtsu Fp6000 A/S are all great options in 225/60R15 tires since they provide strong traction and handling performance.

If you’re looking for a 225/60R15 tire size, you’ve come to the right place with SimpleTire! We’ve got the tires you’re looking for, and we’re certain they’ll be the right fit for your vehicle, your needs, your driving style and your budget. 

Whether you drive a Chevrolet Corvette Collector’s Edition, older BMW 528i or Ford Mustang GT, or something else, SimpleTire has a set of 225/60R15 tires that meets your needs at a great price!

info.title: Did you know?
info.body: A reliable brand is the #1 ask for most drivers. Here you can shop all the most popular brands and discover new ones – all tested, ranked and rated by our customers.
